explanation: No additional symbols are required. lfs_fs_disk_version contains no function calls (its body only reads a field and returns a constant), so it cannot call itself directly or indirectly. Indirect recursion would require lfs_fs_disk_version to call another function which eventually calls back into it; because it has no callees, there is no outgoing call path to form a cycle. Callers listed in the static call graph (lfs_fs_disk_version_major, lfs_fs_disk_version_minor, lfs_format_, lfs_fs_stat_, lfs_fs_desuperblock) are irrelevant for proving this function does not violate the MISRA rule, since callers do not create recursion starting from this function.
